titles.title: Improved Patient Access to Clinical Studies Act of 1996
To permit individuals to continue health plan coverage of services while participating in approved clinical studies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/5/1996--Introduced. Improved Patient Access to Clinical Studies Act of 1996 - Prohibits a health plan from denying, limiting, imposing additional conditions on, or discriminating against an enrollee on the basis of the enrollee's participation in an approved clinical study.
